name: Limestone Fund
overview: Limestone is a specialist Emerging European equity fund manager based in Tallinn. The company was founded in 2007 and is fully owned by its managers. We focus exclusively on delivering to our clients outstanding investment performance. Our home region, Central and Eastern Europe, is one of the most dynamic investment markets in the world. Our track record in managing funds and gaining superior performance in that region is exceptional and a matter of public record. Our current investment mandates cover several of the most attractive and innovative strategies for the region, including socially responsible investment (SRI) and Pre-IPO opportunities, as well as specific asset areas such as real estate equity opportunities. Our philosophy is one of continuous development across a broad portfolio of investment strategies in order to better serve our international client base and continue our long term success.
